If you are not redirected automatically, open: [Toy
workflows](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/articles/toy_workflows.html)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`available_backends()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/available_backends.md)
  : Check which backends are installed and usable

- [`backend_script_dir()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/backend_script_dir.md)
  : Get the installed directory for a script-based backend

- [`bifa_extdata`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/bifa_extdata.md)
  : Example data shipped in extdata

- [`fit_blast()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_blast.md)
  : Fit BLAST (script backend)

- [`fit_bmsfa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_bmsfa.md)
  : Fit BMSFA via MSFA::sp_msfa

- [`fit_bmsfa_2step()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_bmsfa_2step.md)
  :

  Fit BMSFA all-at-once If `post_fit0` is NULL, fit an initial BMSFA
  with given `k` and `j_s`, then automatically select the number of
  factors and refit. Otherwise, use the `post_fit0` then select the
  number of factors and refit.

- [`fit_cavi()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_cavi.md)
  : Fit VI-MSFA CAVI (variational MSFA)

- [`fit_cavi_2step()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_cavi_2step.md)
  : Fit CAVI with automatic factor selection (2-step)

- [`fit_ind_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_ind_fa.md)
  : Fit independent factor analysis (Ind FA) via MSFA::sp_fa (per study)

- [`fit_ind_fa_2step()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_ind_fa_2step.md)
  :

  Fit Ind FA all at once If `post_fit0` is NULL, fit an initial IndFA
  with given `j_s`, then automatically select the number of factors and
  refit.

- [`fit_integrative_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_integrative_fa.md)
  : Fit an integrative factor model with a chosen method within a
  general interface

- [`fit_momss()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_momss.md)
  : Fit MOM-SS (MOM-SS / BFR.BE backend)

- [`fit_pfa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_pfa.md)
  : Fit PFA (Perturbed Factor Analysis; script backend)

- [`fit_stack_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_stack_fa.md)
  : Fit stacked factor analysis (Stack FA) via MSFA::sp_fa

- [`fit_stack_fa_2step()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_stack_fa_2step.md)
  :

  Fit Stack FA all-at-once If `post_fit0` is NULL, fit an initial
  StackFA with given `k`, then automatically select the number of
  factors and refit.

- [`fit_sufa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_sufa.md)
  : Fit SUFA

- [`fit_tetris()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_tetris.md)
  : Fit Tetris (single run)

- [`fit_tetris_2step()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/fit_tetris_2step.md)
  : Run the full Tetris pipeline: initial fit -\> choose T -\> fixed
  refit

- [`install_backend()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/install_backend.md)
  : Install optional backends used in the tutorial

- [`load_backend()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/load_backend.md)
  : Load a bundled script backend into a private environment

- [`load_curated_ovarian()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/load_curated_ovarian.md)
  : Load curated ovarian data (Bioconductor)

- [`load_simulated_nutrition_data()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/load_simulated_nutrition_data.md)
  : Load the simulated nutrition dataset from this package

- [`load_toy()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/load_toy.md)
  : Load the toy example object

- [`load_toy_data()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/load_toy_data.md)
  : Load the toy dataset from this package

- [`plot_single_loadings()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/plot_single_loadings.md)
  : Plot a loading matrix as a heatmap

- [`post_BLAST()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/post_BLAST.md)
  [`postprocess_blast()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/post_BLAST.md)
  : Post-process BLAST output into a standard format

- [`post_CAVI()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/post_CAVI.md)
  [`postprocess_cavi()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/post_CAVI.md)
  : Post-process CAVI output into a standard format

- [`postprocess_bmsfa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_bmsfa.md)
  : Post-process BMSFA output

- [`postprocess_ind_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_ind_fa.md)
  : Post-process Ind FA output (nutrition tutorial)

- [`postprocess_integrative_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_integrative_fa.md)
  : Post-process an integrative factor model fit

- [`postprocess_momss()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_momss.md)
  : Post-process MOM-SS output

- [`postprocess_pfa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_pfa.md)
  : Post-process PFA output (nutrition tutorial)

- [`postprocess_stack_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_stack_fa.md)
  : Post-process Stack FA output (nutrition tutorial)

- [`postprocess_sufa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_sufa.md)
  : Post-process SUFA output

- [`postprocess_tetris()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/postprocess_tetris.md)
  : Post-process Tetris output

- [`refit_cavi()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/refit_cavi.md)
  : Refit CAVI after selecting the number of factors

- [`select_T_tetris()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_T_tetris.md)
  : Select big_T (A matrix) for Tetris

- [`select_js_bmsfa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_js_bmsfa.md)
  : Select J_s for BMSFA from study-specific covariances

- [`select_js_cavi()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_js_cavi.md)
  : Select J_s for CAVI from study-specific covariances

- [`select_js_ind_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_js_ind_fa.md)
  : Select J_s for Ind FA (per-study) using eigen proportion rule

- [`select_k_bmsfa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_k_bmsfa.md)
  : Select K for BMSFA from common covariance

- [`select_k_cavi()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_k_cavi.md)
  : Select K for CAVI from the common covariance

- [`select_k_from_sigma()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_k_from_sigma.md)
  : Select number of factors via eigenvalue proportion rule

- [`select_k_pfa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_k_pfa.md)
  : Select K for PFA via nontrivial-column rule

- [`select_k_stack_fa()`](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/reference/select_k_stack_fa.md)
  : Select K for Stack FA using eigen proportion rule

  workflows](https://mavis-liang.github.io/bmfaToolkits/articles/toy_workflows.md):
